outputs.output_descr: This programme is built on the results of the independent evaluation commissioned by the Government of Finland (the donor) in January 2008 which concluded to the good performance of the programme, highlighted its multiplier effect in mobilizing resources and recommended its extension. Its overall objective is to provide policy advice, technical assistance and catalytic funding to support dryland development and the implementaiton of the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification.
outputs.output_title: Support to Implement CCD in W.

project_descr: Programme for Catalytic Support to implement the convention to Combat Desertification in West Asia and North Africa-Phase IV
project_title: Support to Implement CCD in W.Asia & N.Africa (Phase IV)
